data.strFullDescription:
[h2][b]What is "Your Turn To Die"?[/b][/h2]
Your Turn To Die -Death Game By Majority- is a multi-ending horror adventure game. 
Your decision will directly affect the story and final outcome!

[h2][b]Story[/b][/h2]
Sara Chidouin returns home from school late one night to discover that something's gone terribly wrong.
When she comes to, she finds herself, her friend Joe, and 9 other people trapped in a mysterious place.
Placed in life-and-death situations, they must come to an agreement about what they should do - and who should die.

[b]1. Explore and interact with the unique characters and find a way to escape from the enclosed space![/b]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2067780/extras/初期11キャラ速度普通.gif?t=1703759640[/img]

[b]2. Based on the role cards you are given, discuss and determine who to vote for!
[/b]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2067780/extras/アクション・ギンとニャーちゃん.gif?t=1703759640[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2067780/extras/アクション・土下座ハヤサカ.gif?t=1703759640[/img]

[b]3. Sometimes, in addition to discussions, they are forced to participate in games of life!
[/b]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2067780/extras/敵Jボス.gif?t=1703759640[/img]

Your vote will change the fate of the survivors.
[b]Save the weak or save the beneficial, the choice is yours.[/b]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2067780/extras/dance_2_v2.gif?t=1703759640[/img]

[b]The upcoming Early Access version is not yet complete main story wise; the first part of chapter 3 is complete. The second part will be added as soon as it is completed![/b]

[h2][b]-- Special Thanks --[/b][/h2]
